page.title: 03A school day in Kingswood.
page.content: At 11 years old I (Claire Ford) am in my final year at Courtney Primary.In a {school week}there are 5 days, each beginning at 8.55 and ending at 3.35. We have one hour for dinner and 2 15 minute playtimes.After registration we have{school assembly}when the Headmaster reads a story and we sing hymns and prayers. The 31 children in our class begin work at 9.45.Our {subjects}are Maths,English,Geography, History,Science,Art,Music(a concert of Joseph and the Technicolour Dreamcoat) ,Swimming and Games(Netball, Football, Cricket,Rounders).As 4th year juniors we have responsibility for the class library, ringing a bell at the end of lessons, delivering class register books,setting up the apparatus for physical education lessons, and for joining the school football or netball team.
